what: support for casting numbers to float inside workflow expressions via the float function.
why: to simplify type casting by using a function instead of an intermediate workflow expression variable.

what: making name property required when creating templates, dal connections, workflows, auth clients and sensitivity levels.
why: because we were able to create a resource without any data entered, and with this change now we have a requirement and you cannot create a resource without data entered.
how: by adding validations to prevent creating one of the listed resources without adding a name.

what: the usage of chart.js on admin dashboard with e-charts.
why: to remove all places where we used to use chart.js since we transitioned to apache e-charts.
how: The chart is now in line with other charts in {PRODUCT_NAME}, the date tooltips are now also correctly displayed.

what: the record organizer now gets filtered based on the key field and key value.
why: to avoid putting the knowledge on how to set up the pre-filter and make the record organizer work on the user.
how: by generating a filter based on the key field and value and `AND-ing` it with the pre-filter.

what: record organizer did not properly load when used on record pages while using ${recordID} in pre-filter.
If used on a record page, the values also now get properly prefilled.
how: by properly fetching once the record object becomes available and providing the reference record so values can be prefilled.
by changing the datatype for {PRODUCT_NAME}ID in the PostgreSQL database from bigint to numeric.

what: authenticated role being overwritten on server restart if the role was being modified.
how: by adding a check in the provision logic to skip base roles & RBAC rules if they were already provisioned.

what: integration gateway filter table was not properly refreshed in rare cases.
how: by adding a spinner to the integration gateway filter table, so that it is properly refreshed when fetched.
